email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

We have a client looking to ship 75,000MT of coal from Richards Bay to Rotterdam. Could you provide a freight quote and vessel availability for this shipment? The laycan is flexible, but ideally within the next 2-3 weeks.

Best regards,
Julia

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Julia,

Thanks for reaching out. We can offer the vessel OCEAN TRADER, DWT 85,000, LOA 230m, for this shipment. The starting freight rate is $22.50/MT on a CIF basis. Laycan is 20-25 October. Let me know if this works for your client.

Best regards,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Thanks for the quote. My client finds the rate a bit high. Given the volume and our long-standing relationship, could you consider lowering it to $21.00/MT? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate?

Best regards,
Julia

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Julia,

We can adjust the rate to $21.50/MT, considering the volume and our relationship. The demurrage rate is $15,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this is acceptable.

Best regards,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

$21.50/MT works for us. Please confirm the laycan and send over the recap. Also, ensure the demurrage terms are clearly stated.

Best regards,
Julia

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Julia,

Confirmed. Laycan is 20-25 October, and the demurrage rate is $15,000 per day, pro rata. I'll send the recap shortly.

Best regards,
Alex
